content: **from the website ** *tired of the same old multi-color ripple afghan try this richly textured pattern out for size it still has the attractive zig-zag pattern but a popcorn is used to create wonderful texture off-white yarn makes an especially rich looking afghan but any color would work equally well * **gauge ** one repeat = 7 in 18 cm also available on mary maxim 1 for $3 99 1 http //www marymaxim com/popcorn-ripple-afghan-pattern html
